title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 312.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 312.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to implement the provisions of

Section
143
of the

Public Buildings Law by setting forth the relevant industry standards with
which State agencies must comply when installing new or replacement permanent
outdoor lighting fixtures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
312.1

Adopted

New

York State Register October 5, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 40, eff. 10/5/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
